H0.text: what kind of money does egypt have. Arab Dinar

H1.text: what kind of money does egypt have. Nile Dollar

H2.text: what kind of money does egypt have. African Rand

H3.text: what kind of money does egypt have. Egyptian pound

A4.text: The Egyptian pound (Arabic: جنيه مصرى [ɡeˈneː ˈmɑsˤri, ˈɡeni-]; abbreviations: £, E£, £E, LE, or EGP in Latin, and ج.م. in Arabic, ISO code: EGP) is the official currency of Egypt.

A5.text: Since July 6, 2022, the 10- and 20-pound notes have been made out of polymer plastic paper.
